text: Shutter Island is a 2010 American psychological thriller movie directed by Martin Scorsese, with Leonardo DiCaprio, based on novel Dennis Levane. The movie cost about $80 million to make. Worldwide, it had a total gross profit of $294,803,014. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:2010 thriller movies Category:2010 mystery movies Category:American mystery movies Category:American thriller movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies based on books
title: Shutter Island (movie)
